Title: Enacts the New York 21st century civilian conservation corps act as a means of providing gainful employment to unemployed and underemployed residents of the state; and making an appropriation therefor
Summary: Enacts the "New York 21st century civilian conservation corps act" as a means of providing gainful employment to unemployed and underemployed residents of the state; makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to enacting the "New York 21st century civilian conservation corps act" as a means of providing gainful employment to unemployed and underemployed residents of the state; and making an appropriation therefor
